title: IPRA Request – August 3, 2023 Pursuit and Arrest of Steven Jimenez in Pecos, NM

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New Mexico Inspection of Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to and copies of the following public records related to the August 3, 2023 vehicle and foot pursuit of Steven Jimenez by New Mexico State Police in Pecos, NM:

All body-worn camera footage from NMSP officers involved in the pursuit, vehicle contact, foot chase, and arrest of Steven Jimenez.

All dash camera footage from NMSP vehicles engaged in the pursuit and contact with Jimenez’s vehicle.

Any aerial footage (e.g., drone or helicopter) captured during the incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Georgia Open Records Request – Feb. 12, 2025 Vehicle Pursuit and Arrest of Juvenile Suspects in Armed Carjacking

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to and copies of the following records related to the February 12, 2025 pursuit and arrest of two juvenile suspects in a stolen vehicle near Ingram Road and Pond Road in unincorporated Duluth:

All body-worn camera footage from Gwinnett County Police Department officers involved in the attempted traffic stop, vehicle pursuit, crash, foot chase, and arrest.

All patrol vehicle dashcam footage capturing the pursuit and crash.

Any aerial surveillance footage (e.g., drone or helicopter) recorded during the incident.

Any FLOCK camera hits or alerts related to the identification and tracking of the stolen vehicle used during this incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Georgia Open Records Request – Feb. 28, 2025 High-Speed Pursuit and Arrest of Jose Ramirez-Rodas

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Georgia Open Records Request – Feb. 28, 2025 High-Speed Pursuit and Arrest of Jose Ramirez-Rodas
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to and copies of the following records related to the high-speed pursuit and arrest of Jose Ramirez-Rodas on February 28, 2025, which ended on GA-400 near I-285 in Sandy Springs:

All body-worn camera footage from Sandy Springs Police Department officers involved in the traffic stop, vehicle pursuit, PIT maneuver, and arrest.

All patrol vehicle dash camera footage capturing the pursuit and traffic interactions on GA-400 and I-285.

Any available aerial surveillance footage (e.g., drone or helicopter) of the incident, if used by SSPD or any supporting agency.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: CPRA Request for Bodycam, Dashcam, and Aerial Footage – March 26, 2025 Arrest in Simi Valley

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: CPRA Request for Bodycam, Dashcam, and Aerial Footage – March 26, 2025 Arrest in Simi Valley
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to and copies of the following records related to the March 26, 2025 high-speed pursuit of three organized retail theft suspects, which ended in Simi Valley near the 2500 block of Woodhaven Court:

All body-worn camera footage from Ventura County Sheriff’s deputies involved in the pursuit and arrest.

All patrol vehicle dashcam footage related to the pursuit and foot chase.

Any aerial footage (e.g., helicopter or drone) captured during the incident, including from Sky5 or any law enforcement aircraft.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
